text: Eric or Erik Knudsen may refer to: * Eric Knudsen, a professor of neurology at Stanford University * Eric Alfred Knudsen, American author and politician * Eric Knudsen, creator of the Slender Man character * Erik Knudsen, Canadian actor * Erik Skovgaard Knudsen, Danish mountain bike orienteer ==See also== * Erik Knutsson
title: Eric Knudsen (disambiguation)
